title: Ed Miliband – 2014 Speech on One Nation Labour
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Ed Miliband, the Leader of the Opposition, in London on 17th January 2014.
content:
[![edmiliband](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/edmiliband-214x300.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/edmiliband.jpg)
